Title: Lady Vengeance
Overview: Released after being wrongfully convicted and imprisoned for 13 years, a woman begins executing her elaborate plan of retribution.
Tagline: All she wanted was a peaceful life… they didn't give it.
production_companies: CJ Capital Investment, Korea Capital Investment, Moho Films, TSJ Entertainment, Samsung Venture Capital, Ilshin Capital Investments, Centurion Investment
Cast: Choi Min-sik, Lee Young-ae, Kwon Yea-young
